artist: Artist: Attributed to Iwasa Matabei II
markings:
\"Iwasa Matabei Katsushige
Tatemono (vertical)
Fu_zoku bujin no zuga (Fashionable painting of a beauty)
mukan (unsigned)
Shinseki utagau mono nashi (genuine, nobody doubts the authenticity)
Tora ni-gatsu (Feburary, the year of Tiger)\"
written on the attached piece of paper

\"Haru (spring)\" on the upper margin of the mount
\"Fukashi (deepens)\" on the lower margin of the mount
medium: Ink, color, and gofun on paper
title: Standing Beauty with Sleeve to Her Mouth
